concept.title: Using an HDFS User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the MapR FS destination to use an HDFS user to write data to MapR FS.

conbody.p: MapR FS destinationusing an HDFS user to write to MapR FSBy default, the uses the user account who started it to connect to external systems. When using Kerberos, the uses the Kerberos principal.

To use an HDFS user to connect to MapR FS, perform the following tasks:
On MapR, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HDFS user.
For more information, see the HDFS documentation.
In the MapR FS destination, enter the HDFS user name.
